title: Understand the foundations of web development with this $19 bundle
text:
TLDR: This HTML and CSS Flexbox training will help even first-time creators build their first websites from scratch for only $19.

With the growth of WordPress, Squarespace, Wix and more all-in-one website building platforms, it’s never been easier to pound out a brand-new site in minutes. But what if you want to make some additions or modifications to that site to make it a completely unique online experience? Well then, a little good old fashioned coding know-how is — and will always remain — your best bet.

That programming foundation starts with the core disciplines HTML and CSS. Even if you’ve never typed a line of code before, the training in the Create Your First Website with HTML and CSS Flexbox Bundle will get you conversant in the fundamental languages of programming for only $19 (over 90 percent off) from TNW Deals.

This collection features four courses that can make a coding newcomer comfortable with basic concepts and tools, while helping more established programmers expand their skill sets. With HTML and CSS in your arsenal, you’ll have the tools to build a site or web app or integrate JavaScript and PHP to craft dynamic web pages of your own.

After creating your first functioning website, this training also delves into using flexboxes, an intuitive method of web construction that streamlines your build while aligning resources so the whole thing runs better and faster with greater efficiency.

Armed with all these building box elements, any student will be well on their way to constructing the customized web pages and apps they want — or even launching a web development career of their own.

Each course in this collection costs $200 on its own, but when you go all-in on this bundle, you’ll get all four courses at less than $5 each.
